item.title: Republicans call on Mayorkas to reinstate COVID-era border policy amid tuberculosis 'surge'
item.description: Sen. Mike Lee led some of his GOP colleagues in calling on Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas to reinstate Title 42 due to tuberculosis concerns.
